sense.gloss: prompt decision, immediate decision, on-the-spot decision, snap decision

sdata.j: マイホームは↑一生↑↓いっしょう↓の↑買↑↓か↓い↑物↑↓もの↓だからね、そんな↑即断↑↓そくだん↓↑即決↑↓|そっけつ|↓はできないよ。
sdata.e: A home is a once-in-a-lifetime purchase so you don't want to make any snap decisions.

sdata.j: ↑実↑↓じつ↓のところ、↑即決↑↓|そっけつ|↓を↑悔↑↓く↓やんでないといったら↑嘘↑↓うそ↓だった。
sdata.e: Truthfully, if I'd said I didn't have any regrets over my snap decision I'd have been lying.

sdata.j: オクは↑面倒↑↓めんどう↓なので↑即決↑↓|そっけつ|↓で↑一↑↓いち↓↑回↑↓かい↓↑買↑↓か↓っただけ。
sdata.e: Auctions are annoying, so I bought it instantly with a buyout.
